projects.name: 3D Object Reconstruction from Dolphin Echolocation @ ARL
projects.summary: Designing deep learning pipelines to decode target information from dolphin clicks for voxel-level 3D reconstruction.
projects.advisors: A/Prof. Mandar Chitre & Dr. Matthias Hoffmann-Kuhnt

projects.name: Individual and Material-Based Variability in Dolphin Click @ ARL
projects.summary: Developed signal-processing and bi-LSTM models to decode dolphin clicks across different individuals and materials. Demonstrated both individual-specific and material-sensitive echolocation patterns as the first study in the field. Advanced understanding of how dolphins adapt sonar for perception, accepted to OCEANS 25 as the first author.
projects.advisors: A/Prof. Mandar Chitre & Dr. Matthias Hoffmann-Kuhnt

projects.name: Pascal-S Language Compiler Design and Implementation @ SCS
projects.summary: Designed and implemented a Pascal-S language compiler targeting C and RISC-V. Leveraged Flex and Bison to construct syntax trees, applying smart pointer utilization for memory management. Conducted syntax analysis and developed error handling and recovery mechanisms to enhance compiler robustness.

projects.name: An Intelligent AIoT Solution for Household Plant Care@ SWS
projects.summary: Directed the hardware workstream, ensuring communication between the hardware components and backend. Developed edge computing modules by mapping cloud predictions to GPIO outputs.

projects.name: Automatic Grayscale Image-Colorization @ CCISTC
projects.summary: Investigated image colorization using CNNs, focusing on mitigating color leakage and object boundary artifacts. Conducted extensive literature reviews and proposed a convolutional-deconvolutional architecture.
